title: This year's divisors
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the mean of all positive divisors of the number 2016?"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016!"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" + "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Then number of prime(s) among "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n + 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n + 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\ldots "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n + 2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is?"}]}]}
